page: MA61007: Data Warehousing And Data Mining

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: void Data warehousing, OLAP and Data mining, Classification of data mining techniques, Discovery and analysis of patterns, trends, and deviations, Data mining models: decision trees, genetic algorithms, neural nets, etc. Clustering, Enabling data mining through data warehouse. Data marts, Multidimensional databases, Data mining applications.
